name: Crashy Flying Robot 3D
description:
Super Speed Studios Now Presents, the ultimate racing extravaganza. Future is robot as Iron body costume with extra NOS. Lets see how good your reflexes are.

How To Play:

Tilt phone to change direction & speed. But be careful not to crash

Get free coins and Outrun your friends & drivers to unlock new car ships Hovercrafts

Dodge in the endless traffic on procedurally generated asphalt tracks. Each gameplay is going to be a new experience

Crashy Flying Robots Features:

- Ultimate in Hovercraft to fly
- ENDLESS space city Venture
- UNLOCK cool Hovercraft
- Easy SWIPE controls
- Crazy CRASHES
- extreme graphics
- hardcore police chases (with helicopters!)
- almost impossible challenges
- rich and random tracks
- extensive car tuning
- fast traffic racing action

Product of Super Speed Studios
